QuestData.Title: A Vessel Made Ready
QuestData.Description: After some consideration, I have decided to allow Alleria another opportunity to pursue her destiny.$b$bI suppose you want to know what that means, mortal.$b$b<Locus-Walker laughs.>$b$bMeet us deep in the Shadowguard camp ahead- my brethren are preparing a summons that will provide adequate energy for Windrunner to begin again.$b$bWitness what happens when you harness the Void's power.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Though only a demi-god, Nhal'athoth's presence haunts the dark corners of Eredath.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat Nhal'athoth and collect his heart.
QuestData.RewardText: <Alleria takes the heart in her hands.>$b$bThis is the next step, $n. Thank you for bringing me to this point.
